description.zh-cn: 伊斯兰教的第二大教派，与逊尼派并称。其追随者认为穆罕默德的女婿阿里·本·阿比·塔利卜是其正统继承人。
description.en: The second largest branch of Islam, alongside Sunni Islam. Its adherents believe that Prophet Muhammad's son-in-law, Ali ibn Abi Talib, was his rightful successor.

description.zh-cn: 伊斯兰教的最大教派，与什叶派并称。他们认为穆罕默德的同伴阿布·伯克尔是其正统继承人。
description.en: The largest branch of Islam, alongside Shia Islam. They consider Prophet Muhammad's companion, Abu Bakr, to be his rightful successor.

description.zh-cn: 伊斯兰教的先知，被穆斯林认为是“众先知的封印”。
description.en: The prophet of Islam, considered by Muslims to be the 'Seal of the Prophets'.

description.zh-cn: 穆罕默德的堂弟和女婿，被什叶派认为是第一代伊玛目和穆罕默德的正统继承人，也是正统哈里发时期的第四位哈里发。
description.en: Cousin and son-in-law of Muhammad, considered by Shia Muslims as the first Imam and the rightful successor to Muhammad, and the fourth of the Rashidun Caliphs.

description.zh-cn: 穆罕默德的女儿，阿里·本·阿比·塔利卜的妻子。
description.en: Daughter of Muhammad and wife of Ali ibn Abi Talib.

description.zh-cn: 穆罕默德的同伴和岳父，伊斯兰教的第一任正统哈里发。
description.en: A companion and father-in-law of Muhammad, and the first of the Rashidun Caliphs.

description.zh-cn: 伊斯兰教的第二任正统哈里发。
description.en: The second of the Rashidun Caliphs.

description.zh-cn: 伊斯兰教的第三任正统哈里发，于656年被暴徒杀害。
description.en: The third of the Rashidun Caliphs, who was assassinated in 656.

nodes.id: 侯赛因·本·阿里·本·阿比·塔利卜

zh-cn: 侯赛因·本·阿里·本·阿比·塔利卜

description.zh-cn: 阿里·本·阿比·塔利卜的次子，什叶派的第三代伊玛目。他在卡尔巴拉战役中殉难，成为什叶派信仰中的核心人物。
description.en: The second son of Ali ibn Abi Talib and the third Shia Imam. His martyrdom at the Battle of Karbala is a central event in Shia Islam.

description.zh-cn: 阿里·本·阿比·塔利卜的长子，什叶派的第二代伊玛目。
description.en: The eldest son of Ali ibn Abi Talib and the second Shia Imam.

description.zh-cn: 伊斯兰教历史上的第一个世袭王朝，由穆阿维叶一世建立。
description.en: The first hereditary dynasty in Islamic history, founded by Mu'awiya I.

description.zh-cn: 一场发生在倭马亚王朝与侯赛因·本·阿里·本·阿比·塔利卜之间的战役，侯赛因及其追随者在此战中阵亡，成为什叶派历史上的重大悲剧。
description.en: A battle between the Umayyad Caliphate and Husayn ibn Ali, in which Husayn and his followers were killed. It is a major tragic event in Shia history.

nodes.id: 阿卜杜·拉赫曼·伊本·穆尔贾姆

zh-cn: 阿卜杜·拉赫曼·伊本·穆尔贾姆

description.zh-cn: 哈瓦利吉派成员，因刺杀阿里·本·阿比·塔利卜而闻名。
description.en: A member of the Kharijites, known for assassinating Ali ibn Abi Talib.

description.zh-cn: 由伊斯玛仪一世建立的伊朗王朝，将什叶派十二伊玛目派定为国教，对伊朗的什叶派化起到了决定性作用。
description.en: An Iranian dynasty founded by Ismail I, which established Twelver Shi'ism as the state religion and played a decisive role in the Shi'ification of Iran.

description.zh-cn: 萨非王朝的创始人，于1501年自称沙阿。
description.en: Founder of the Safavid dynasty, who declared himself Shah in 1501.

description.zh-cn: 1979年在伊朗发生的一场推翻巴列维王朝的革命，由什叶派教士领导，最终建立了伊朗伊斯兰共和国。
description.en: A 1979 revolution in Iran that overthrew the Pahlavi dynasty, led by Shia clerics, and resulted in the establishment of the Islamic Republic of Iran.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗什叶派革命领袖，伊朗伊斯兰革命的领导者和伊朗伊斯兰共和国的创始人。
description.en: An Iranian Shia revolutionary leader, the leader of the Iranian Revolution and the founder of the Islamic Republic of Iran.

description.zh-cn: 2003年开始的伊拉克冲突，此战后伊拉克什叶派的地位持续上升。
description.en: A conflict in Iraq starting in 2003, after which the status of Shia Muslims in Iraq continued to rise.

description.zh-cn: 美国第43任总统。有学者认为其政府解放了伊拉克的什叶派多数，促成了什叶派的复兴。
description.en: The 43rd President of the United States. Some scholars believe his administration liberated the Shia majority in Iraq, contributing to a Shia revival.

description.zh-cn: 一个于969年占领埃及后建立的什叶派王朝，信奉伊斯玛仪派。
description.en: A Shia caliphate, of the Isma'ili branch, that was established after conquering Egypt in 969.

description.zh-cn: 什叶派与逊尼派是伊斯兰教两大主要教派，但他们之间不时爆发严重的暴力冲突。什叶派在历史上屡受多数派的逊尼派打压。
description.en: Shia and Sunni are the two main branches of Islam, but severe violent conflicts often erupt between them. Historically, the Shia have been frequently suppressed by the majority Sunni.

description.zh-cn: 法蒂玛是先知穆罕默德的女儿。
description.en: Fatimah is the daughter of the Prophet Muhammad.

description.zh-cn: 阿里·本·阿比·塔利卜迎娶了穆罕默德的女儿法蒂玛。
description.en: Ali ibn Abi Talib married Muhammad's daughter, Fatimah.

description.zh-cn: 什叶派认为穆罕默德的女婿阿里·本·阿比·塔利卜才是正统继承人。
description.en: Shia Islam holds that Muhammad's son-in-law, Ali ibn Abi Talib, is the rightful successor.

description.zh-cn: 什叶派拒绝承认阿里之前第一位哈里发阿布·伯克尔的合法统治地位。
description.en: Shia Islam rejects the legitimate rule of the first Caliph, Abu Bakr, who preceded Ali.

description.zh-cn: 什叶派拒绝承认阿里之前第二位哈里发欧麦尔·本·赫塔卜的合法统治地位。
description.en: Shia Islam rejects the legitimate rule of the second Caliph, Umar ibn al-Khattab, who preceded Ali.

description.zh-cn: 什叶派拒绝承认阿里之前第三位哈里发奥斯曼·本·阿凡的合法统治地位。
description.en: Shia Islam rejects the legitimate rule of the third Caliph, Uthman ibn Affan, who preceded Ali.

description.zh-cn: 哈桑是阿里的儿子。
description.en: Hasan is the son of Ali.

relationships.source: 侯赛因·本·阿里·本·阿比·塔利卜

description.zh-cn: 侯赛因是阿里的儿子。
description.en: Husayn is the son of Ali.

relationships.source: 侯赛因·本·阿里·本·阿比·塔利卜

description.zh-cn: 侯赛因是哈桑的弟弟。
description.en: Husayn is the younger brother of Hasan.

relationships.source: 阿卜杜·拉赫曼·伊本·穆尔贾姆

description.zh-cn: 哈瓦利吉派的伊本·穆尔贾姆刺杀了阿里。
description.en: Ibn Muljam of the Kharijites assassinated Ali.

relationships.target: 侯赛因·本·阿里·本·阿比·塔利卜

description.zh-cn: 侯赛因·本·阿里·本·阿比·塔利卜在卡尔巴拉战役中被杀害，成为什叶派的殉道者。
description.en: Husayn ibn Ali was killed in the Battle of Karbala, becoming a martyr for the Shia.

description.zh-cn: 伊斯玛仪一世在1501年自称为沙阿，创立了萨非王朝。
description.en: Ismail I declared himself Shah in 1501 and founded the Safavid dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 萨非王朝通过强迫民众改信等手段，把伊朗变成以什叶派穆斯林为多数的地区。
description.en: The Safavid dynasty transformed Iran into a predominantly Shia Muslim region through means such as forced conversion.

description.zh-cn: 什叶派于969年占领埃及，建立了法蒂玛王朝。
description.en: Shia forces conquered Egypt in 969 and established the Fatimid dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 作为革命领袖，霍梅尼领导了1979年的伊朗伊斯兰革命。
description.en: As the revolutionary leader, Khomeini led the 1979 Iranian Islamic Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 自伊拉克战争后，逊尼派国家忧虑什叶派有崛起的迹象，什叶派的地位持续上升。
description.en: Since the Iraq War, Sunni states have been concerned about the rise of Shia influence, and the status of the Shia has continued to rise.

description.zh-cn: 学者瓦利·纳斯尔认为，布什政府解放了伊拉克的什叶派多数，襄助什叶派强势复兴。
description.en: Scholar Vali Nasr argues that the Bush administration liberated the Shia majority in Iraq, aiding a powerful Shia revival.
